overview:
Sukesh Pai is Vice President - Engineeering of MediaMelon, responsible for leading a team that has developed a sophisticated online video platform with applications such as CDN Switching, Predictive Forward Caching and Dynamic Content Assembly.

Ten years prior experience at Microsoft in a variety of demanding engineering roles.

Engineering Management expertise in a fast paced startup to highly process-oriented large corporation. Skilled Product Manager with customer relationship and lifecycle management experience to bring quality software products to market.

Web 2.0, E-commerce marketplace, embedded system, Interactive TV middleware/apps, scalable server architecture, team building, customer relationship.

Software Architect with extensive experience in Microsoft technologies including .NET framework, ASP.NET, IIS, MSMQ, Active Directory, SQL server, Windows CE.
